hint: Push filters early into CTEs, convert implicit joins to explicit JOIN syntax, and pre-filter dimension tables before the main aggregation.
Isolate date filtering into a CTE, then materialize pre-filtered dimension and fact tables before the aggregation, finally apply decorrelation techniques.
Pre-filter all dimension tables into materialized CTEs, then compute the base aggregation once and derive both sides of the self-join from it.
Transform the self-join by computing a single CTE with all months, then use conditional aggregation or UNION-based approaches to compare consecutive months, while pushing filters early.
